RootCommand.Description: UnifiWatch - Monitor stock availability for Ubiquiti products
WaitOption.Description: Wait for products to be in stock
StoreOption.Description: Store to check (Europe, USA, UK) - uses GraphQL API
LegacyApiStoreOption.Description: Store to check (Brazil, India, Japan, Taiwan, Singapore, Mexico, China) - uses Shopify API
NoWebsiteOption.Description: Do not open website when product is in stock
NoSoundOption.Description: Do not play sound when product is in stock
List.Headers.Name: Name
Monitor.CheckingStockDone: Checking stock... Done, sleeping for {0} seconds
ConfigWizard.SelectStore: Which Ubiquiti store do you want to monitor?
ConfigWizard.ProductFilters: Product Filters (optional - leave empty to monitor all products)
ConfigWizard.ProductNames: Product names to monitor (comma-separated, or press Enter to skip)
ConfigWizard.ProductSkus: Product SKUs to monitor (e.g., UDM-SE, comma-separated, or press Enter to skip)
ConfigWizard.CheckInterval: How often to check stock (in seconds, 30-3600)
ConfigWizard.Notifications: How should we notify you when stock is available?
ConfigWizard.DedupeWindow: How long to wait before sending the same notification again (in minutes, 1-60)
ConfigWizard.SelectLanguage: What language would you like to use?
ConfigWizard.SmtpPort: SMTP port number (usually 587 for TLS, 465 for SSL)
ConfigWizard.UseTls: Use secure TLS encryption for email?
ConfigWizard.FromAddress: Email address to send from (usually your email address)
ConfigWizard.Recipients: Email addresses to send notifications to (comma-separated)
ConfigWizard.EmailPassword: Email password or app-specific password (input is hidden)
ConfigWizard.SmsProvider: Which SMS provider do you use?
ConfigWizard.PhoneNumbers: Phone numbers to send SMS to (comma-separated, include country code like +1)
ConfigWizard.AuthToken: Twilio Account SID or API authentication token (input is hidden)
ConfigWizard.InvalidNumber: Please enter a number between {0} and {1}
ConfigWizard.AuthMethod: Which email authentication method do you use?
ConfigWizard.OAuthInfo: Requires Azure AD app with Mail.Send application permission (admin consent)
ConfigWizard.OAuthMailbox: Mailbox email address (shared mailbox or service account)
